places.name: Park Central
places.description: A beautiful park with walking trails and a large pond.

places.name: Museum of Art
places.description: A museum showcasing local artists and historical exhibits.

places.name: Downtown Market
places.description: An open-air market featuring fresh produce, handmade crafts, and local foods, open year-round.

places.name: Historic Theatre
places.description: A vintage theater offering a variety of live performances, films, and community events.

places.name: Botanical Garden
places.description: A serene garden filled with exotic plants and flowers, perfect for nature lovers and photographers.

places.name: City Observatory
places.description: Offers panoramic views of the city, with public stargazing nights and educational events.

places.name: Riverwalk
places.description: A scenic walking trail along the river with bike rentals, cafes, and outdoor activities.

places.name: City Zoo
places.description: Home to over 200 species, the zoo provides educational exhibits and animal encounters for all ages.
